# HUD::SET_USE_ISLAND_MAP

## Summary
Hides the interior minimap map this frame

## Parameters
* **BOOL** useIslandMap

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Toggles the Cayo Perico map.
